subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ woes went from bad to worse Saturday night as they learned that Brendan Shanahan was not close to returning to action and then lost to one of the worst teams in the Western Conference.
snippet: The Rangers’ woes went from bad to worse Saturday night as they learned that Brendan Shanahan was not close to returning to action and then lost to one of the worst teams in the Western Conference.
